General.Name: Jiangxi Changyun Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Changyun Co., Ltd. provides passenger road transportation services in Jiangxi Province. The company constructs road passenger transport, passenger stations, as well as maintains operations; and provides travel, logistics, tourism, car rental, and property management services. It operates 80 passenger stations, 9,127 vehicles, and 2,437 operating vehicles. Jiangxi Changyun Co., Ltd., was formerly known as the state-owned enterprise Jiangxi Long-distance Bus Transport Company. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanchang, China.
General.Address: Jiulong Lake Management Office, Nanchang, China, 330100
